attributes.action: scrap adult fares for 16 and 17 year olds who are still classed as children in most situations and circumstances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Does it annoy you when you're classed a child still, yet when you travel on buses, trains, planes, etc, you have have to pay adult fares, and this is for everywhere. Either class 16 and 17 year olds as adults or children, and if we are still being classed as minor people of society then scrap adult fares for us.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
